meanings.sent1: The strong smell of the vomity medicine made her feel queasy.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had a vomity odor that made everyone in the room gag.
meanings.sent3: The chef's attempt at a new recipe was so vomity that even the dog refused to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The color of the paint was so vomity, it reminded me of a nauseating stomach bug.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the food was so vomity, it felt like swallowing a lumpy mess.

meanings.sent1: The vomity stain on the carpet was impossible to remove.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a vomity appearance that turned everyone's stomachs.
meanings.sent3: The costume was meant to be funny, but it ended up looking quite vomity.
meanings.sent4: The smell in the alley was so vomity, it seemed like the entire street had gotten sick.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the mud was so vomity, it felt like stepping in something truly disgusting.
